title: Sam Harris debate with Rabbi David Wolpe at the American Jewish
description:
This is one of the most civil, intelligent, and entertaining debates I have ever seen, but the origial uploader wasn&#039;t getting a lot of play over his smaller service. What follows below are the words of the original uploader on Mininova:



Does God Exist? 

A debate between best-selling authors Rabbi David Wolpe and Sam Harris.

the file comes in flv-format, usually played with macromedia flashplayer in a browser. But this can also be played by vlc and media player classic and i am sure many other media players as well.

you can also watch the stream directly from American Jewish University homepage from the following link: http://www.ajula.edu/Content/ContentUnit.asp?CID=1766
